title: 10 Trim-the-Tree'ers
description: 1 shiny golden star at the very tip top.2 strings of flashing lights that just won't stop.Â Count your way to the holidays with ten little neighbors trimming the tree in their building's lobby. Janet Schulman and Linda Davick, the creators of 10 Trick-or-Treaters, return with this brightly-colored Christmas book that begs to be read-aloud again and again.
author: Janet Schulman
